body:
try opening http://html5test.com/ and see if webgl is enabled.
Some democode: https://github.com/atom/atom-shell/issues/1277
This is broken again in v0.25.1.
Can confirm. Electron v0.25.1 on Win7 64bit.
Still broken in v0.25.2 as well.

It seems to work on a fresh installed 32bit Windows 7 provided by modern.IE.

![screen shot 2015-05-04 at 4 02 23 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/639601/7450407/011267a8-f277-11e4-8298-32036faa9186.png)

I created a new project with just the basic files, `index.html`, `main.js` and `package.json`. I copied all the default settings from the quick start tutorial. When I run the app I get the following in the console.

```
[19588:0504/013037:ERROR:gl_surface_egl.cc(161)] eglInitialize failed with error UNKNOWN
[19588:0504/013037:ERROR:gl_surface_win.cc(164)] GLSurfaceEGL::InitializeOneOff failed.
[19588:0504/013037:ERROR:gpu_child_thread.cc(161)] Exiting GPU process due to errors 
during initialization
[4544:0504/013037:INFO:renderer_main.cc(200)] Renderer process started
```

Using Windows 7 x64 and running electron-v0.25.2-win32-x64.

Still reproducible with v0.25.2 on Win7 64bit:

```
[2452:0504/114719:ERROR:gl_surface_egl.cc(161)] eglInitialize failed with error UNKNOWN
[2452:0504/114719:ERROR:gl_surface_win.cc(164)] GLSurfaceEGL::InitializeOneOff failed.
[2452:0504/114719:ERROR:gpu_child_thread.cc(161)] Exiting GPU process due to errors during initialization
[4276:0504/114719:INFO:renderer_main.cc(200)] Renderer process started
[4276:0504/114725:ERROR:ipc_channel_win.cc(414)] pipe error: 232
[4276:0504/114725:ERROR:ipc_channel_win.cc(414)] pipe error: 232
```

The computer is a laptop Lenovo T540p with a NVIDIA GeForce GT730M (plus the integrated Intel HD Graphics 4600)
Can you navigate to `chrome://gpu` and paste the results? And does WebGL work in Chrome 42 on your machines?

WebGL works fine in regular Chrome. Here are the working `chrome://gpu` results:


+1. I'm also having the same issue as the others above.

EDIT: I should add that this is not working when using electron-v0.25.2-win32-x64, but it IS working with electron-v0.25.2-win32-ia32.

For people that have this issue: Does WebGL work on 0.24.0? And what about 32 build?

> EDIT: I should add that this is not working when using electron-v0.25.2-win32-x64, but it IS working with electron-v0.25.2-win32-ia32.

This is very helpful, thanks!

Hi,
This is what I have found:
- electron-v0.24.0-win32-ia32 **OK**
- electron-v0.24.0-win32-x64 **ERROR**

```
[5300:0506/082122:ERROR:gl_surface_egl.cc(161)] eglInitialize failed with error UNKNOWN
[5300:0506/082122:ERROR:gl_surface_win.cc(163)] GLSurfaceEGL::InitializeOneOff failed.
[5300:0506/082122:ERROR:gpu_child_thread.cc(146)] Exiting GPU process due to errors during initialization
[5208:0506/082122:INFO:renderer_main.cc(212)] Renderer process started
```
- electron-v0.25.2-win32-ia32  **OK**
- electron-v0.25.2-win32-x64 **ERROR**

```
[3548:0506/082319:ERROR:gl_surface_egl.cc(161)] eglInitialize failed with error UNKNOWN
[3548:0506/082319:ERROR:gl_surface_win.cc(164)] GLSurfaceEGL::InitializeOneOff failed.
[3548:0506/082319:ERROR:gpu_child_thread.cc(161)] Exiting GPU process due to errors during initialization
[4060:0506/082319:INFO:renderer_main.cc(200)] Renderer process started
```

Hope this helps!
